transcript.text: Well, hello, how are you my dear friends ? I'm pretty well.
I love to stick the mike to my mouth. I think that YOU love it less though.
Friends, yesterday, at the moment I'm recording this video, it was Christmas Eve.
Who says Christmas Eve says : gifts, food, hicks' bawdy songs...
Yeah, there's actually someone who started one.
But much rarer and more incredible than that, my friends, my dad gave me a real treasure,
something of inestimable value, the most beautiful gift.
An envelope filled with drawings I made when I was between 5 and 8 !
It's the most beautiful gift I could have ! 😂
First, it's cool because I had to record today and I didn't have any ideas
well it gave me an amazing idea, so thanks dad !
And then, I find it amazing because I don't remember anything at all !
So it will remind me by watching them. I struggled not to *burp* look. Sorry, it's the oysters.
To not look at the drawings that are inside, because my brother received the same envelope but with his drawings.
and he looked at them all in front of me.
So I really wanted to open mine but I held myself back !
Dude, it's a real treasure which is inside. When I'l open it, it will probably be...
*pretends to be schocked*
Wow ! Nah, I'm joking, actually in the envelope, there was an envelope. That's all.
"Dessins Lucas" dude, it's incredible !
We will watch them together one by one, I didn't scan them so I will have to show you like that but well...
it's a little video, calm, laid-down atmosphere, quickly done after Christmas.
The first one, oh yes, I loved to scotch papers to make drawings like that for example.
Oh la la la la la, this one is big !
Oh la la it's big !

It's a real "Dragon de la more" !
("Dragon Of The Death", with a spelling mistake at the word "death")
I don't find that disgusting.
I just don't really see where the dragon is, and even less the death.
Although, I clearly see where is the spelling mistake, no problem with that.
Well it's a very beautiful dragon of the death anyway. Don't hesitate to send me YOUR Dragons Of The Death.
I will only accept those where there is a spelling mistake at "death" of course.
Next drawing.

June 99 ! Dude, I was 3 ! It's from June 99 !
(99 = 1999)
And it's stylish ! This character is awesome ! 😂
It looks like a jaded guy !
"Lucas", between quotation marks : "My Dad"
I'm sorry Dad.
I don't really know where you actually are.
What I can tell you is that you have a big penis anyway.
Because this really is a penis, we'll not lie.
So I may have seen you naked one time when I was young and it impressed me.
We can see that at that time I drew the feet like nowadays, and this, it makes me happy.
And inside, what is it ?
Oh ! A poem !
"In your arms, my daddy, I feel way taller, less fearful, happier. I love you more..."
I read this poem really badly.
So what is this ? It's not a drawing at all.
Dad, what you bought recently doesn't really interest me.
I know that you wanted to drag it into the folder in secret but I... *strange noise with the mouth*
In any case, I hope you will have fun with your home automation controller Jeedom Smart Z-Wave, Dad, really.
Anyway ! Oh it's cute, look, a little letter "for Daddy" !
Ah my brother did it. Ah but he put it in the wrong folder !
What did my brother write ? Oh it's his Christmas letter ! It's cute !
"Hi Daddy ! I send you what I told you that I would want for Christmas. Kisses. Smack."
What did he want for Christmas ? Attention...
A remote-controlled car !
"A fast robot able to grab objects thanks to his powerful claws ! The success of your mission is guaranteed !"
So, if I may allow myself, I think it messed up Florent, because I've never seen you with this robot.
So I think that Santa didn't come that year !
So, what is this ?
Ah, this is stuff that you had to do, I think at the infant school or at the nursery. You had elements, you could stick them.
Ah no, you just had to stick elements where it was indicated. Okay so there is no creative spirit in here. It's just uh... There is no use.
June 2001, I was 5.
I don't understand anything, I really don't know what's going on in our heads when we're kids.
Maybe it's like that ?
Like that ?
Like that... ?
I don't know what it is.
Does anybody see the Dragon Of The Death thereupon ?
It's not there !
Happy Father's Day Dad !
Hey my dad, it's the best dad though.
He kept everything I offered him, isn't it crazy ?
Ok, he received a letter at that time with a Disney thing on it.
What is it ? Oh la la, look at how I was already drawing really really bad.
I think it's a skater or a guy on a snowboard.
This drawing is worhtless !
Dad, I am really sorry for sending you characters of this quality.
Because it's like, really not beautiful.
On the back, what is it ? Pff, look at how my brother was drawing, look at the difference already.
He was already drawing so well this little bastard !
It's so... I didn't understand at that time that making a drawing of this quality at the back of a drawing of THAT quality,
it was perfectly humiliating and it didn't put me in value at all.
In fact, I think that I wanted to remake my brother's character who was there. The original version...
The damn poor version !
It's amazing, my mother specified, she wrote "Lucas"
but it's so obvious that it was me who did this one and that my brother did the really stylish drawing at the back.
Next !
It's a certificate telling that I explored an anthill at "The Children's city".
I don't remember actually...
Oh la la la la la, so here, dude,
it's Christmas. Look at what I did at Christmas.
A fucking Christmas tree... in shining paper !
It's weird because, you know, you have flashes of very distant memories that come back when you see stuff that old.
It's me who did it so my brain put this info somewhere !
In nothingness for example. And it comes back a little.
And I remember I couldn't make a real fir.
You see, it doesn't make a fir at all. It doesn't work at all.
And I was sad because I failed it. But anyway...
And my mother, as usual, who specifies at the back that it's me. But mom !
You really think that Florent will do this ? It's incredible !
Hey wait, it opens ! Oh la la la, dude,
is it quality or not ? It's really the standard of the child.
The child really writes like that et does things like that.
"Merry Christmas, Mom and Dad."
"If you want, I will buy you a nice thingie"
"In any case, the main thing is that you are happy and that we will not do foolishness anymore, Florent and me."
"If you want, we will sing the "Frères Jacques"
Haha it's funny !
To be forgiven they just want to sing
"Kisses, see you soon, Lucas."
It's cute. It's cute anyway, eh ? These little children, they're cute.
Dude, it's also impressive that I still write the same way.
I kept the same handwriting.
To those to whom I have dedicated a "Tourne la page", look at the handwriting, it's exactly the same.
It's incredible !
First drawing ! And it's not disgusting, dude !
It has a amazing quality, dude ! It's a Dragon Ball Z character.
Frankly, if I had to do it again now, I would do it less well.
But for real, look, I did details on the muscles !
I think the trick is that I took model on my brother's drawings to do my own.
So in fact, it was really, just, I copied what I was seeing. So, it's a bit... It's easy.
Look, it's from July 2003, dude. It's really old !
Oh attention, a new bad guy, after the Dragon Of The Death, I introduce you...
the Demon Of The Death !
He isn't scary at all ! He has a dandelion on his head, dude.
Oh ! And here there is a sketch of the Dragon Of The Death.
A first version of the Dragon Of The Death, that I tried.
A new bad guy once again, always with drops of blood
flowing from the weapons, it's a very important detail.
Oh so funny, I still do the same eyes !
I really didn't evolve !
Oh ! This one is really worked. Really here, we gave our all.
Dude.
Oh it's disgusting, it gives me chills, this shit.
Okay here, we really did shit huh
but I think that it's a Super Saiyan because there is a Super Saiyan aura around.
When I was watching DBZ I was seeing this in fact.
I didn't have the same vision as the others.
Attention, first evolution :
It was a turning point in my career
After that I was contacted a lot to expose myself but I refused because I was too young
Being a minor I couldn't cash the money so it didn't interest me.
We're now creating thickness at the arm's level.
On the other hand, at the legs' level, we still are at the stade of simple lines.
But honestly, here at the arm's level, who look like dicks, there is an effort.
2001, "Medley around a woodfire".
Well, I, I think the term "medley", it's really my mom who... who wrote it huh.
Here is what a "Medley around a woodfire" looks like.
It looks more like some voodoo rite by people who wanna summon a demon, but hey !
I was even doing kind of books with little drawings inside, worthless and ugly.
How come that I stopped ?
I think I was just imitating my brother but I wasn"t made for it huh.
Oh la la ! A masterpiece !
Fuck, dude ! I got my revenge on the previous year's fir !
I finally succeeded at making the so hoped shape of a fir !
Well I was just following the school teacher's instructions but...
Hey okay, I succeeded at making this fucking fir dude, I was happy.
Fuck dude, look, I have another thing where "The Death" is written, it really is the children's expression !
"Hey I made a Ninja of the Death !"
*gasp* Fuck I broke it.
*gasp* I broke it Dad, I'm sorry !
Ah but no it's in several parts.
Ok I'll need to put it down dude.
We're in "Stranger Things" mode.
Okay it's good I succeeded.
So we've got a 6-papers drawing, it represents a wonderful "Thug of the Death".
What do you think of it ?
Hey he's going away ! But that's crazy !
At the bottom we've got tombs ! Tombs ! It's extremely glaucous.
THIS represents snow.
And the Nike logo in a despised way.
And I'm walking on a... a corpse.
But to show that it's a corpse I just put a skull.
Well this one looks a little dumb but I liked it.

The most reckless ones will recognize the really clear inspiration of "Poivre Blanc".
("White Pepper")
The "Thug Tees" as I called them with my brother, we only bought these tee-shirts so we redrew the characters who were on it.

Yeah I was a thug. 
(Using the actual English word)
And there, we have an empty envelope, we just looked at everything dude.
Fuck I would have liked there to be mooooore !
Friends, it's the end of this video. It was quite short.
I wish we had more fun but, unfortunately, there aren't any drawings left, we did all of this though dude, there are lots of them huh !
Don't hesitate to like the video if you liked it.
I love nostalgia, stuff that dates from 2000, 20002, when I was 6, 8 years old, it's amazing because-
It's a time that you completely forgot, you forgot everything you did at that time.
And seeing such old stuff again, well you have little fragments of memories who reappear like this.
It's really funny !
Don't hesitate to like the video if you liked it, and, most importantly, if you liked my 6-year-old-self drawings.
It will be nice to me from 15 years ago
I'm sending you a lot of kisses, I hope the holidays were nice even if it was one week ago, and I hope you're enjoying your gifts !
Seeeee you soooon !
